Question
========

Marleen wants to test whether the IQ of her students is significantly higher than the IQ of the general population. She does this by conducting a one-sided test for an average.

What does the alternative hypothesis of this test look like? 
Answerlist
----------
* $H_{a}: \; \mu = \mu_{0}$
* $H_{a}: \; \mu \neq \mu_{0}$
* $H_{a}: \; \mu > \mu_{0}$
* $H_{a}: \; \mu < \mu_{0}$

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Correct
* Incorrect
